Information from Sens: Amy Klobuchar and John Barasso discussing the Keystone XL pipeline on "Meet the Press" in 2015.
Statement from Sen: John Barrasso on "Meet the Press" claiming that the United States is now the No. 1 producer of oil in the world, surpassing Saudi Arabia.
Data from the U: S. Energy Information Administration showing that the United States has been producing more oil than Saudi Arabia since the fourth quarter of 2012, with a chart illustrating the trend.
